intervention_catalogue.name: Constructive Conversations
intervention_catalogue.long_description:
Series of three resource packs design to assist staff in structuring exploratory conversations with ‘terrorist risk' cases.

It is structured in 3 stages:
Stage 1 - Commencing conversations
Stage 2 - Continuing conversations
Stage 3 - Changing conversations

Stage 1 and 2 can be delivered by Probation Practitioners, Counter Terrorism Specialist Probation Practitioners and Prison Prevent Leads.

Stage 3 can only be delivered by Counter Terrorism Specialist Probation Practitioners.
